content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":222292,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義の部下達は、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi's subordinates,"},{"lineNumber":222293,"originalJapaneseLine":"早雲の無事な姿に喜び、","translatedEnglishLine":"were pleased to see Souun safe,"},{"lineNumber":222294,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義を含めた魔王の子達を称えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and praised the Demon King's children including Rangi."},{"lineNumber":222295,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、魔王の子達の消耗が激しいということで、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, since the Demon King's children were heavily exhausted,"},{"lineNumber":222296,"originalJapaneseLine":"野営地はその場に留まり、次の日になってから","translatedEnglishLine":"the camp stayed in place and they decided to resume departure the next day."},{"lineNumber":222297,"originalJapaneseLine":"再出発することとなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They would set out again the following day."},{"lineNumber":222298,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは野営地の端っこに作ったキャンプで、","translatedEnglishLine":"You were alone at your campsite made at the edge of the camp,"},{"lineNumber":222299,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人星空を見上げていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"looking up at the starry sky alone."},{"lineNumber":222300,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスがザンスと乱義の二人と","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance was engaging in mock battles with Zans and Rangi,"},{"lineNumber":222301,"originalJapaneseLine":"模擬戦するということで、人はそっちに集まり、","translatedEnglishLine":"so people gathered there,"},{"lineNumber":222302,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの周りはなんとも静かだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"making the area around you very quiet."},{"lineNumber":222303,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ククク……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":222304,"originalJapaneseLine":"　面白い……』","translatedEnglishLine":"Interesting...\""},

{"lineNumber":222305,"originalJapaneseLine":"『貴様、なにか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You, something..."},

{"lineNumber":222306,"originalJapaneseLine":"『混じっているな？』","translatedEnglishLine":"Something is mixed within you, isn't it?\""},

{"lineNumber":222307,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは昼間、悪魔ネプラカスに","translatedEnglishLine":"You recalled what the demon Neprakus said earlier that day."},

{"lineNumber":222308,"originalJapaneseLine":"言われたことを思い出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You remembered what he told you."},

{"lineNumber":222309,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪魔の言うことが本当なのであれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"If the demon's words were true,"},

{"lineNumber":222310,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの中にはなにかがある。","translatedEnglishLine":"then there is something inside of you."},

{"lineNumber":222311,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、それはあの天災のような","translatedEnglishLine":"And that something was what repelled that disastrous"},

{"lineNumber":222312,"originalJapaneseLine":"クエルプランを退ける何かであった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Quelpuran."},

{"lineNumber":222313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":222314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、相棒」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, buddy.\""},{"lineNumber":222315,"originalJapaneseLine":"声をかけられ顔を向けると長田君がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"When you turned toward the voice, Nagata was there."},

{"lineNumber":222316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前こんなとこにいたのかよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were here in a place like this?"},

{"lineNumber":222317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どしたん？　一人で」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's wrong? Alone?\""},

{"lineNumber":222318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":222319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだよ、黙りこくって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what's with the silence...?"},

{"lineNumber":222320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........\""},{"lineNumber":222321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……昼間のこと考えてんの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Are you thinking about earlier today?\""},{"lineNumber":222322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの悪魔が言っていたよな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That demon said something, didn't he..."},{"lineNumber":222323,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか混じってるって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"About something being mixed in...\""},

{"lineNumber":222324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、心当たりないの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you have any idea what it might be?\""},{"lineNumber":222325,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは首を横に振った。","translatedEnglishLine":"You shook your head."},

{"lineNumber":222326,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そっかぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see...\""},

{"lineNumber":222327,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":222328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まっ！　あんま気にしてもしょうがねぇって！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well! There's no point worrying too much about it!\""},

{"lineNumber":222329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今までも別におかしなことなかったんだろ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nothing strange has happened until now, right?"},

{"lineNumber":222330,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなら平気に決まってるっしょ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then surely everything's fine!\""},

{"lineNumber":222331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ま、だからよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So, don't worry too much, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":222332,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんま気にすんなって？」","translatedEnglishLine":""},

{"lineNumber":222333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、なんだ？　難しい話か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What's that? A complicated story?\""},

{"lineNumber":222334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ダークランスさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Dark Lance."},

{"lineNumber":222335,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザンス達と模擬戦してたんじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Weren't you having mock battles with Zans and the others...?\""},

{"lineNumber":222336,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつら……特にザンスは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those guys... especially Zans,"},

{"lineNumber":222337,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死ぬほどしつこいから、","translatedEnglishLine":"are annoyingly persistent to death,"},

{"lineNumber":222338,"originalJapaneseLine":"　適当なところで切り上げてきたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I wrapped it up at a reasonable point.\" "},

{"lineNumber":222339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、うん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, hmm?\""},

{"lineNumber":222340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだ、なんか悩みか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What's up? Got some worries?\""},

{"lineNumber":222341,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、なるほどなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I see."},

{"lineNumber":222342,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自分の中にある自分も知らない力……","translatedEnglishLine":"A power inside you that even you don't know about..."},

{"lineNumber":222343,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怖がる気持ちも分からなくはないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can understand being scared of it.\" "},

{"lineNumber":222344,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、あんま気にすることないだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, you probably don't need to worry about it much.\" "},

{"lineNumber":222345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かるっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Light words.\" "},

{"lineNumber":222346,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスはこともなげに言った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance said casually."},

{"lineNumber":222347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だってなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because, you see,"},

{"lineNumber":222348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺なんて悪魔だけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm a demon, but,"},

{"lineNumber":222349,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結構楽しく生きてるぜ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm living quite happily.\" "},

{"lineNumber":222350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、お前の力のことでアレコレと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, there might be people saying all sorts of things about your power..."},

{"lineNumber":222351,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言う奴がいるかも知れないが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"but...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義の部下達は、
早雲の無事な姿に喜び、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were pleased to see Souun safe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義を含めた魔王の子達を称えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and praised the Demon King's children including Rangi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、魔王の子達の消耗が激しいということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since the Demon King's children were heavily exhausted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野営地はその場に留まり、次の日になってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the camp stayed in place and they decided to resume departure the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再出発することとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They would set out again the following day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは野営地の端っこに作ったキャンプで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were alone at your campsite made at the edge of the camp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人星空を見上げていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: looking up at the starry sky alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスがザンスと乱義の二人と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance was engaging in mock battles with Zans and Rangi,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 模擬戦するということで、人はそっちに集まり、
あなたの周りはなんとも静かだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making the area around you very quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ククク……
面白い……』
『貴様、なにか……
『混じっているな？』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something is mixed within you, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは昼間、悪魔ネプラカスに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You recalled what the demon Neprakus said earlier that day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われたことを思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You remembered what he told you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔の言うことが本当なのであれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the demon's words were true,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの中にはなにかがある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then there is something inside of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それはあの天災のような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that something was what repelled that disastrous

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランを退ける何かであった。
「おう、相棒」
声をかけられ顔を向けると長田君がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you turned toward the voice, Nagata was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前こんなとこにいたのかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You were here in a place like this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どしたん？　一人で」
「な、なんだよ、黙りこくって……」
「……昼間のこと考えてんの？」
「あの悪魔が言っていたよな……
なんか混じってるって……」
「お前、心当たりないの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you have any idea what it might be?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは首を横に振った。
「そっかぁ……」
「まっ！　あんま気にしてもしょうがねぇって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well! There's no point worrying too much about it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までも別におかしなことなかったんだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nothing strange has happened until now, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなら平気に決まってるっしょ！」
「……ま、だからよ。
あんま気にすんなって？」
「お、なんだ？　難しい話か？」
「あ、ダークランスさん。
ザンス達と模擬戦してたんじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weren't you having mock battles with Zans and the others...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつら……特にザンスは
死ぬほどしつこいから、
適当なところで切り上げてきたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I wrapped it up at a reasonable point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、うん？」
「……なんだ、なんか悩みか？」
「んー、なるほどなぁ」
「自分の中にある自分も知らない力……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A power inside you that even you don't know about...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖がる気持ちも分からなくはないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can understand being scared of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、あんま気にすることないだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you probably don't need to worry about it much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かるっ」
ダークランスはこともなげに言った。
「だってなぁ」
「俺なんて悪魔だけど、
結構楽しく生きてるぜ？」
「ま、お前の力のことでアレコレと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there might be people saying all sorts of things about your power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言う奴がいるかも知れないが……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

早雲の無事な姿に喜び、

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、魔王の子達の消耗が激しいということで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, since the Demon King's children were heavily exhausted,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 野営地はその場に留まり、次の日になってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the camp stayed in place and they decided to resume departure the next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再出発することとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They would set out again the following day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは野営地の端っこに作ったキャンプで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were alone at your campsite made at the edge of the camp,

あなたの周りはなんとも静かだった。

面白い……』
『貴様、なにか……
『混じっているな？』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something is mixed within you, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは昼間、悪魔ネプラカスに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You recalled what the demon Neprakus said earlier that day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言われたことを思い出していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You remembered what he told you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪魔の言うことが本当なのであれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the demon's words were true,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの中にはなにかがある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then there is something inside of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それはあの天災のような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that something was what repelled that disastrous

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエルプランを退ける何かであった。
「おう、相棒」
声をかけられ顔を向けると長田君がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you turned toward the voice, Nagata was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前こんなとこにいたのかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You were here in a place like this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どしたん？　一人で」
「な、なんだよ、黙りこくって……」
「……昼間のこと考えてんの？」
「あの悪魔が言っていたよな……
なんか混じってるって……」
「お前、心当たりないの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you have any idea what it might be?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは首を横に振った。
「そっかぁ……」
「まっ！　あんま気にしてもしょうがねぇって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well! There's no point worrying too much about it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今までも別におかしなことなかったんだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nothing strange has happened until now, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなら平気に決まってるっしょ！」
「……ま、だからよ。
あんま気にすんなって？」
「お、なんだ？　難しい話か？」
「あ、ダークランスさん。
ザンス達と模擬戦してたんじゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weren't you having mock battles with Zans and the others...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつら……特にザンスは
死ぬほどしつこいから、
適当なところで切り上げてきたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I wrapped it up at a reasonable point."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、うん？」
「……なんだ、なんか悩みか？」
「んー、なるほどなぁ」
「自分の中にある自分も知らない力……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A power inside you that even you don't know about...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖がる気持ちも分からなくはないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can understand being scared of it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、あんま気にすることないだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you probably don't need to worry about it much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かるっ」
ダークランスはこともなげに言った。
「だってなぁ」
「俺なんて悪魔だけど、
結構楽しく生きてるぜ？」
「ま、お前の力のことでアレコレと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there might be people saying all sorts of things about your power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言う奴がいるかも知れないが……」
